explanation: Multiple opinions suggest strong buying pressure on BTC, with references to whales accumulating, bots being rekt on sell attempts, and bullish sentiment prevailing. Several users express optimism for higher price targets (119-125k by end of June), and the overall tone is positive despite isolated bearish comments. There are more positive than negative/neutral opinions, with active encouragement to buy and references to major institutional buying.
representative_opinions: OH YEAH!: BUY WITH BLACKROCK NEVER LOSE
RaberTrades: I think we hit 119-125k end of June
